title: VK API JSON Schema
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API objects and methods

methods.name: board.addTopic
methods.description: Creates a new topic on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Topic title.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text of the topic.

parameters.name: from_group
parameters.description: For a community: '1' — to post the topic as by the community, '0' — to post the topic as by the user (default)

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: List of media objects attached to the topic, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' — Type of media object: 'photo' — photo, 'video' — video, 'audio' — audio, 'doc' — document, '<owner_id>' — ID of the media owner. '<media_id>' — Media ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614", , "NOTE: If you try to attach more than one reference, an error will be thrown.",

methods.name: board.closeTopic
methods.description: Closes a topic on a community's discussion board so that comments cannot be posted.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID.

methods.name: board.createComment
methods.description: Adds a comment on a topic on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: ID of the topic to be commented on.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Required if 'attachments' is not set.) Text of the comment.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'text' is not set.) List of media objects attached to the comment, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' — Type of media object: 'photo' — photo, 'video' — video, 'audio' — audio, 'doc' — document, '<owner_id>' — ID of the media owner. '<media_id>' — Media ID.

parameters.name: from_group
parameters.description: '1' — to post the comment as by the community, '0' — to post the comment as by the user (default)

parameters.name: sticker_id
parameters.description: Sticker ID.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Unique identifier to avoid repeated comments.

methods.name: board.deleteComment
methods.description: Deletes a comment on a topic on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

methods.name: board.deleteTopic
methods.description: Deletes a topic from a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID.

methods.name: board.editComment
methods.description: Edits a comment on a topic on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: ID of the comment on the topic.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Required if 'attachments' is not set). New comment text.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of media objects attached to the comment, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' — Type of media object: 'photo' — photo, 'video' — video, 'audio' — audio, 'doc' — document, '<owner_id>' — ID of the media owner. '<media_id>' — Media ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614"

methods.name: board.editTopic
methods.description: Edits the title of a topic on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID.

parameters.name: title

methods.name: board.fixTopic
methods.description: Pins a topic (fixes its place) to the top of a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID.

methods.name: board.getComments
methods.description: Returns a list of comments on a topic on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID.

parameters.name: need_likes
parameters.description: '1' — to return the 'likes' field, '0' — not to return the 'likes' field (default)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of comments.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of comments to return.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' — to return information about users who posted comments, '0' — to return no additional fields (default)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: 'asc' — by creation date in chronological order, 'desc' — by creation date in reverse chronological order,

methods.name: board.getTopics
methods.description: Returns a list of topics on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_ids
parameters.description: IDs of topics to be returned (100 maximum). By default, all topics are returned. If this parameter is set, the 'order', 'offset', and 'count' parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order: '1' — by date updated in reverse chronological order. '2' — by date created in reverse chronological order. '-1' — by date updated in chronological order. '-2' — by date created in chronological order. If no sort order is specified, topics are returned in the order specified by the group administrator. Pinned topics are returned first, regardless of the sorting.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of topics.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of topics to return.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' — to return information about users who created topics or who posted there last, '0' — to return no additional fields (default)

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: '1' — to return the first comment in each topic,, '2' — to return the last comment in each topic,, '0' — to return no comments. By default: '0'.

parameters.name: preview_length
parameters.description: Number of characters after which to truncate the previewed comment. To preview the full comment, specify '0'.
